Bought 3 for my husband.  Fit him like a glove.  He likes the material and likes the way he looks in them.  I wash in Woolite in cold water and lay flat to dry.  I do not hang, he folds them to his liking.  Knitted material has a tendency to lose its shape if not handled properly.  I learned this from years of knitting:  The knitted products have to be washed, dryed, and stored properly no matter what the content of the yarn.

PJ PAUL JONES Men's Knit Polo Shirt is a perfect blend of comfort and style, crafted from soft, breathable knitted fabric with an intriguing texture. The classic design with a lapel collar and hollow-out details adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit, making it suitable for a variety of occasions from casual outings to holiday celebrations.

评论概述: Super Nice Shirt, Comfy and Different Looking
评论详情: So, this is a very nice shirt. It fits really well and is extremely comfortable. It has an open knit weave so even though it's a bit on the heavy side, it keeps you cool. Sometimes I wear it with a T-Shirt underneath and in that case it keeps me warm. So it's versatile, you can wear it on either warm or cool days, whichever you prefer.  The cut is nice as it's not too boxy and not too tight. I love the color. The three buttons are done right so they look correct. The knit pattern might be a little unusual for some, so be careful. It's definitely different in that regard.  Having said all that, for this price, it is a really good buy.....as long as you like the look.
This fits my husband very well. The color is nice and vibrant and it has held up well after being washed and dried a few times. He says it's comfortable as well.
This polo is a much better top than I expected.  The color is bright, but surprisingly, does not overwhelm once it’s worn.  Material is soft; knitting is well done and the fit is true to size.

评论概述: Me gusta mucho el producto.  Me queda a la medida exacta
评论详情: Excelente

评论概述: Very bright and has breathing holes in fabric
评论详情: The PJ Paul Jones knit polo shirt in turquoise is made of a thin fabric that has breathing holes in it.  It is kind of stretchy and fits ok.  But it is BRIGHT.  Not my favorite color and is almost like a sweater fabric, but much lighter.

The knit fabric has this texture that's hard to describe, but it's what sets it apart from the rest. The hollow-out knit? Genius. It adds this cool touch that's both stylish and breathable. I've worn it on some scorching days and it's kept me feeling fresh.But here's the kicker: the compliments. Seriously, I've never had so many people ask me about a shirt before. The texture, the fit, everything seems to catch people's attention. It's like wearing a confidence booster.

评论概述: Cool and attractive for the summer.
评论详情: The PJ Paul Jones men's knit short sleeve shirt is a very nice addition to a summer wardrobe. The knit texture of the shirt is decorative and cooling at the same time. The fit is good, not too big or too tight, but comfortable for the warm days ahead. The color may be a bit bright now but when the days get into the '80*s  and above,  the sun bleaches a lot of color from most garments.  This shirt will make you feel fine and look cool.
Spring ready with a twist. Very nice quality shirt that you can wear about anywhere!

评论概述: Stylish and Breathable Knit Polo Shirt for Summer
评论详情: The PJ PAUL JONES Men's Knit Polo Shirt is a standout addition to any wardrobe, offering style, comfort, and breathability perfect for summer occasions.  Let's start with the fabric. The knit material used for this polo shirt is not only soft but also provides a decent level of comfort. It feels great against the skin, making it suitable for extended wear during warmer weather. Additionally, the knit construction adds an extra layer of breathability, ensuring you stay cool and comfortable throughout the day.  The vibrant color of the shirt adds a pop of brightness to any ensemble, making it an ideal choice for summer beach parties or casual outings. Paired with linen pants and loafers, this polo shirt effortlessly elevates your look with a touch of sophistication.  One of the standout features of this shirt is its fit. The sizing is pretty accurate, and the shirt drapes nicely on the body without feeling too tight or too loose. Whether you're lounging by the beach or enjoying a casual day out, the fit of this polo shirt will keep you looking stylish and put-together.  Highly recommended.

I like this shirt! It fits perfectly. As a general rule, I order a large shirt size. This shirt is no exception, so I'm betting that the other sizes also fit correctly. The knit itself is open, so there is quite a bit of airflow. This shirt will be nice in the warmer months ahead since it won't cause me to sweat. It is also generously long. I can wear it either tucked in or outside my pants; either way, it looks great. My only real complaint is that it is machine washable, but you can't tumble dry. I'll deal with it, but I'm going to guess that if I forget, my large is going to become a small size. At least the color has held; it hasn't bled on my other clothes. Bottom line? Considering the try, this shirt's size and style cost is quite reasonable.

评论概述: Dressy looking enough to wear for semi-formal wear
评论详情: This is one good looking shirt, with a great feel against your skin and a wonderful sheen to it. The fit is on the slim side for those with a trim physic. It will stretch some and it allows for free arm movements.

Polo shirts have been a favorite of mine for many years and I have worn out dozens of them during that time. I have to admit, I have never owned a knitted polo shirt, and the feel of this one when I put it on felt a bit odd. The sizing was good, which is a plus. The tag says it is 95% viscose (rayon) and 5% polyester. I guess I have become so accustomed to the feel of my traditional cotton or cotton blend polo shirts that this combination of materials seems kind of foreign to me. The large knit tends to make the material sag somewhat giving it a bit of a sloppy feel.  Just based on my personal taste and preference, after trying it on, I would return this shirt if I purchased it at a local store.

The Paul Jones polo is very comfortable. The knit design is very breathable, but do wear an undershirt as it can be very form fitting.  I got the turquoise polo and while I like the color, it seems more appropriate for the golf course than the office. I like the feel of the shirt as I had no restriction in movement and it's very comfortable with a distinctive design due to the knit texture.

I really liked this shirt at a first glance. The blue is a fun vivid color I can see myself wearing when the weather is a bit warmer, the shirt itself feels like it allows breathability. Not sure if this is the hollow texture, but I like it, hopefully it won't become see-through as I'm a bit of a chunky guy. I ordered a size Large, it fit pretty well, so if you're in between sizes I'd recommend getting the size larger instead. I do think the silhouette could be a bit better shaping, like bring in the shoulders and waste a bit to create a more muscled look on the arms and shaping out the torso without making you look fat. Small critique aside, I really like the polo. I found no loose stitching, weird marks, damage of any kind and I 100% plan to make this a fun shirt to wear on daylight dates with my girlfriend.

I love the color of this shirt it is bright and beautiful. It is also accurate to the link. The material is soft and breathable. The sizing chart is accurate and the shirt fits very well. It comes in at a really good price point. It works for casual and dress occasions. I am pleased.
Plush shirt with an amazing color. Love the feel and texture and is going to go well with my island adventures and boat trips! A great short overall.

I like textured solid color shirts that have subtle design and this shirt has a very nice knit design that makes it stand out. My husband likes blue color although it is little more brighter and bold than I was expecting. He is 5'10" and 195 pounds and wears large and this shirt in large size fits him very well. I usually get him 44-45 bust size and the size chart was mapping to XL but I still got large and it fits great.  The shirt is stitched well and design is striking. The fabric however does not feel soft and comfortable for long day wear. I was hoping that washing it would soften the fabric but unfortunately it did not. My husband prefers wearing this with white undershirt which gives a nice contrast and also prevents fabric touching the skin. This will be a nice shirt for party and casual wear.

评论概述: This is one great shirt, and it'll be perfect for our hot summers down here in the Deep South
评论详情: I've never been one to normally buy clothing online, as I normally like to feel the fabric, try it on for fit before I buy such. Since on VINE I've gotten a few things to try, and mostly been quite pleased with the results. This shirt is PERFECT, for my tastes, feel and style. I love it! It's very comfortable, I really like the knit feel which breathes great for our summer heat, and the fit was right on; even with what I'm told is wide shoulders. I'm 6', about 185 give or take a few depending on the day, and the large fit perfectly. And I really like the vibrant blue color of the shirt; though I'd call it more of a dark turquoise myself. It's seems extremely nice for the price, when I compare it to others similar that I have, that I paid much more for. I've no qualms about giving this 5 stars, and that will only change if something affecting the wear or other flaws shows up. Right now, after a good wash it's great. And it does have the extra button that normally comes with my nicer shirts.

The color is more of a Caribbean Blue which is lighter than a normal blue. Not easily wearable as a professional shirt but definitely can pass for a nicer party shirt or for a nice dinner. The fit was perfect and true to size. The bottom of the shirt is stretchy and cuffed so it doesn't ride up which is what you want in a more fitted polo. The sleeves are a perfect length. Having said all this, I'm not a fan of the design pattern or the quality of the fabric. The design pattern looks good, however the holes go all the way through the shirt so if you look closely you can see your skin through the shirt where it stretches on your body. I wasn't a fan of that. Additionally, the feel of the shirt on my body felt VERY uncomfortable, almost a scratchy feeling. It definitely wasn't the soft feel you crave in a shirt that stretches. All in all the color, fit, and look was good but the hole design and quality took away from it.

评论概述: Trendy New Knitted Polo Shirt Designed
评论详情: Cool trendy knitted polo design that will be the new fashion look this spring and summer. You can dress it up or down and it looks great. Brilliant turquoise color is perfect for spring and summer. Very nice trendy polo for the price.

评论概述: A bold stylish breezy shirt that reeks of high fashion
评论详情: I adore the exquisite shirt! It is much better than anticipated. Right off the bat, quality is apparent. Its hollowed-out knit fabric presents a unique and striking look. High fashion here, folks. I appreciate that it's soft, comfortable, and stretchy. Certainly, it's a shirt that could be worn year-round but it emits a sort of summer feel with its breezy presentation. The color is dynamite. I seldom see this type of aquamarine color in a shirt. Glad I discovered this gem!

评论概述: The color wasn't to my taste - looked more female to me
评论详情: Color is so subjective and for me when i first saw the item i just didn't like the color and appeared way minty green-ish or turquoise (Its listed as blue) and bright.  That's not a great color for me and after trying it on I didn't think it was for me.  That said if you like bright colors like that this would stand out and on the right skin color could look great.  My pale European skin washes me out with this color.However, it did fit well and the material was nice and felt good.  It was a comfortable fit and appeared to be well made.  As a short sleeve shirt you can wear through the spring, summer and autumn and I'd be happy to do so if I felt the color was more my style.  I may try and see if i can get it in a different color but only this one was available at the time of selection.

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable Knit Polo Shirt for Men
评论详情: The PAUL JONES Men's Knit Polo Shirt is a versatile addition to any wardrobe, seamlessly blending style and comfort. Crafted with attention to detail, this shirt boasts a unique hollow-out knit design that adds a touch of sophistication to your casual or semi-formal attire.  One of the standout features of this polo shirt is its texture knitted fabric, which not only enhances its visual appeal but also ensures breathability and comfort throughout the day. The lightweight material makes it ideal for warmer weather, allowing you to stay cool and stylish even on the hottest days.  The short sleeve design offers freedom of movement, making it perfect for both leisurely activities and more active pursuits. Whether you're heading out for a weekend brunch or a casual outing with friends, this polo shirt effortlessly elevates your look without sacrificing comfort.  The attention to detail is evident in every aspect of this shirt, from the finely crafted collar to the reinforced stitching, ensuring durability and longevity. The classic polo shirt silhouette is complemented by modern details, making it a timeless addition to your wardrobe that you'll reach for again and again.  Available in a range of sizes and colors, the PAUL JONES Men's Knit Polo Shirt offers something for every style preference. Whether you prefer a classic navy or a bold red, there's a shade to suit every taste.  Overall, the PAUL JONES Men's Knit Polo Shirt is a must-have for any man who values both style and comfort. With its impeccable craftsmanship, versatile design, and attention to detail, it's sure to become a staple in your wardrobe for years to come.
